BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACT_GIS_SLIS_SPECI_DTL_LOG T (T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE,T.NUM_AMOUNT,T.GNUM_SLNO,T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM,T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GSTR_REMARKS,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,T.STR_GIS_SLIS_AC_NO) (SELECT T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE,T.NUM_AMOUNT, ?, (T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM ) ,(T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO ), T.GNUM_ISVALID ,?,?,?,?,T.GSTR_REMARKS,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,T.STR_GIS_SLIS_AC_NO from ACT_GIS_SLIS_SPECI_DTL t where T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? and T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE=? )

UPDATE ACT_GIS_SLIS_SPECI_DTL T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?,T.STR_GIS_SLIS_AC_NO=?,T.GSTR_REMARKS=?,T.NUM_AMOUNT=?,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? AND T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1

INSERT INTO ACT_GIS_SLIS_SPECI_DTL_LOG T (T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE,T.NUM_AMOUNT,T.GNUM_SLNO,T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM,T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO,T.GNUM_ISVALID,T.GNUM_SEAT_ID,T.GDT_ENTRY_DATE,T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID,T.GSTR_REMARKS,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,T.STR_GIS_SLIS_AC_NO) (SELECT T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER,T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE,T.NUM_AMOUNT, ?, (T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM ) ,(T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO ), 0 ,?,?,?,?,T.GSTR_REMARKS,T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,T.STR_FINANCIAL_YEAR,T.STR_GIS_SLIS_AC_NO from ACT_GIS_SLIS_SPECI_DTL t where T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? and T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE=? )
delete ACT_GIS_SLIS_SPECI_DTL T where T.STR_EMPLOYEE_NUMBER=? AND T.STR_CAT_TYPE_CODE=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
